overview: After shooting his first film, Marco understands a few things: mystery is only an early stage of the process and behind it lives an apparent normality, dull at times, comfortable but exhausting. However, below it are voices that continues to scream, unresolved tensions and unexplained impulses. Why do we do it? Where does the need to express ourselves come from? From spirits that we don't understand yet.
title: Oyendo águilas
